aye and a merry christmas to you ya blimey bastard.

Though I am of the belief that community concerns on the matter may be exceeding the awareness necessary to resolve the issue, and I politely proffer my thoughts on the desultory attempts to implement a profanity filter in the Oceania server.
From my experiences and the anecdotes of peers, riot support whilst not prompt, is somewhat lenient in the resolution of excessive punishment for use of expletives in chat that were not directed at another, and I am not inclined to believe that this issue of an inconveniencing language filter will escalate much further without intervention from riot support. On the Oceania server the determination of whether language is directed as abuse and is intended to cause distress, or is simply a part of the colloquial and a part of our uniquely amiable culture; can be quite hard to differentiate through haphazard cursory methods; such as detection of keywords generally associated with execration of other players or simply particularly visceral malediction.

In summary, chat filter is dumb, it doesn't work, and it probably won't be kept for very long for aforementioned reasons. Merry Christmas friends!
Pseudo intellect at it finest; A convoluted conversation to make a simple point.

To be a good writer you must learn to be concise. Words are used to aids a setence; In bringing out it details and comprehensive meaning. 

In your case, you're using words that are not meant for the complexity of the coversation you are holding. In another words, you're stretching it needlessly. Read poetry, and you will know how to weave words together in an artful way.

Let me introduce you to the least concise but most artfully literate man _(mer?)_ I know of.

http://78.media.tumblr.com/38867f83e773b78337eebd1df7648a73/tumblr_owjdqcNiOz1rbmp18o6_1280.png

Among his many deeds, the Clockwork God proves that sometimes convolutance and incomprehensibility can indeed be more beautiful and insightful than simplicity.

For is not the answer that provides more questions, inherently of greater value than a question with multiple answers?
Merry christmas fuckers, have a few snag sangas and sink a few tinnies ya mad c"nts
